hibernate-mapping.query: SELECT DISTINCT o FROM Town o LEFT JOIN FETCH o.nameTemporals t LEFT JOIN FETCH t.value v LEFT JOIN FETCH v.translations tr LEFT JOIN FETCH o.typeTemporals tt LEFT JOIN FETCH tt.value tv LEFT JOIN FETCH tv.translations ttr WHERE t.invalidDate='2100-12-31' and (tt is null or tt.invalidDate ='2100-12-31') and o.status=? and o.parent.id=?
select count(*) from Town t where t.status=? and t.parent.id=?

SELECT DISTINCT t FROM Town t LEFT JOIN FETCH t.nameTemporals nt LEFT JOIN FETCH nt.value nv LEFT JOIN FETCH nv.translations ntr left join fetch t.typeTemporals tt left join fetch tt.value ttt WHERE t.id=? and nt.invalidDate='2100-12-31' and tt.invalidDate='2100-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT t FROM Town t LEFT JOIN FETCH t.nameTemporals nt LEFT JOIN FETCH nt.value nv LEFT JOIN FETCH nv.translations ntr WHERE t.id in (:ids) and nt.invalidDate='2100-12-31'
SELECT DISTINCT t FROM Town t LEFT JOIN FETCH t.typeTemporals nt LEFT JOIN FETCH nt.value nv LEFT JOIN FETCH nv.translations ntr WHERE t.id in (:list_1) and nt.invalidDate='2100-12-31'

select distinct t from Town t left join fetch t.nameTemporals nt left join fetch nt.value v left join fetch v.translations tr left join fetch tr.lang l where t.status = 0 and t.parent.id=? and nt.invalidDate='2100-12-31' and lower(tr.name) like ?
SELECT DISTINCT t FROM TownNameTemporal t LEFT JOIN FETCH t.value v LEFT JOIN FETCH v.translations tr LEFT JOIN FETCH tr.lang l LEFT JOIN FETCH l.translations WHERE t.id=?
SELECT DISTINCT n FROM TownName n LEFT JOIN FETCH n.object LEFT JOIN FETCH n.translations tr LEFT JOIN FETCH tr.lang l LEFT JOIN FETCH l.translations WHERE n.id=?
